line: there’s this woman that i like

but but it’s not like anything’s ever gonna happen
these these are just feelings they’re gonna go away

hey listen let me ask you do you believe in soul mates
i believe that there is one perfect person out there for everyone
and do you know how you find him
that’s why i stopped looking for russell crowe
i mean i believe that uh certain people are more suited for each other and i believe in falling in love but soul mates i don’t think they exist
well last night i met monica’s
yeah i had a date with this guy and i swear to god he is her other half

a tall guy with hair similar to mine oh unknowable universe

and he’s he’s so centered and mature and confident
oh it’s so sad they never had a chance to meet

i but y’know i’m gonna go out with him again i’ll find out more

oh y’know i still i can’t believe it
joey and rachel i mean it’s it’s like you and me going out only weirder
all right i know you’re hurting and and i want to be supportive but don’t say that again

then he’d be the stepfather of my child

first of all he’s he’s never gonna tell her how he feels about her
and even if he did you have no idea how she’d react
sure because women never like joey
y’know i think he’s a virgin

all he’s thinking about is how you’re taking this
i mean listen it’s totally freaking him out

he says he wants to leave the country
i no i don’t hate him
honey i can’t even imagine how hard this must be for you
but i don’t want you to lose joey over it
and right now he just needs to know that you’re still his friend
now do it soon he just asked me how to convert his dollars into vermont money
umm chandler monica this is don
so what have you guys been doing
well we just had a terrible lunch today at reattica
what is with all the sun dried tomatoes at that place
what’s wrong with sun dried tomatoes
so don what what other restaurants do you like
and there’s this great little place alessandro’s
that’s my restaurant i’m the chef there
wow i really want to talk to you about your menu once i get some coffees first
if you’re gonna talk about me i’m gonna go with you
i swear to god i didn’t know you guys would be here
and the good news is you didn’t believe in soul mates
i believe in tall handsome strangers who hit on my wife
they’re just talking and y’know what
just because i think they’re soul mates doesn’t mean anything’s gonna happen
oh he’s great i love him
don’t worry we’ll find you someone else
look i understand if you came by to hit me i deserve it
no i don’t want to hit you
no no i don’t want to do anything to you
i just want to tell you that i’m not mad at you and and that i certainly do not hate you
i just i just came here to say that

do uh do you got any beer
all all i got is this melon stuff that rachel left
hey look ross you need to understand something okay
i uh i am never gonna act on this rachel thing okay
i i would never do anything to jeopardize my friendship with you
anyway it uh look it’ll just take me a while to get over her that’s all

yeah i thought you knew that
hey look if it helps i don’t want to feel this way
i just keep thinking ah i’ll get over this
i just it just keeps gettin’ harder
i don’t i don’t know what to do
i think you need to tell her how you feel
okay that’s the green stuff talkin’
you you need to find out where she is because if she’s not where you are then you can start to move past this
but what if uh and i’m not saying she will be but
if she is where you are then uh then my feeling weird about it shouldn’t stand in the way
look if if she’s gonna end up with somebody else the truth is she couldn’t find a better guy
so when do you think you’re gonna talk to her
oh my god i have to tell her
i haven’t even thought about what i will say
i’m understanding but let’s not get carried away
so i’ve been slowly phasing out the wine importing and focusing more on the cheese side of things
that’s some pretty smelly work huh don
you must smell a lot of the time too
but when it comes to cheese i’m one of the people who thinks the smellier the better
he won’t even allow me to have blue cheese in the house
and you’re still married to him
you know what i’d love to do
i would like to go to france and eat nothing but bread and cheese not even bread just cheese
oh i’m really not high it’s just i used to be fat
well if you where ever enter the loire valley let me know i’ve got a great little villa you can stay at

just uh just stand up straight
i uh i just came by because i i want to talk to you about something

so can you just make it quick

just leave me a message and tell me where to meet you
okay that give you a couple hours to prepare what you’re gonna say

so look i won’t stand in your way if you want to run off with don and live in a house of cheese
chandler you don’t believe in soul mates

some days we work really hard
so you you don’t want to live with don in a cheese house

do you realize how hard that would be to clean
i am going to take you out to dinner tonight

and i know chandler is kidding but it happens every time he touches my stomach

uh look at the uh the reason is it hot in here

uh how long have we known each other
um seven e e eight eight years
but over the past few weeks

and the um waiter came over and cut his tip in half and umm now here we are
uhh i i think i’m falling in love with you
i’m falling in love with you
are you uh how did umm when
wow it is hot in here

you you uh you take as much time as you need
joey joey i love you so much but i
